en_title: Google Identifies Coordinated Cyber Ops Against Defense Sector
cn_title: Google 指出中國、伊朗、俄羅斯、朝鮮協調對國防部門進行網絡行動
en_summary: State-sponsored actors from multiple countries are targeting the defense industrial base, focusing on vulnerabilities in edge devices and supply chain risks in the context of global conflicts.
cn_summary: 來自多個國家的政府資助黑客正針對國防工業基地，重點關注全球衝突背景下的邊緣設備漏洞和供應鏈風險。

en_title: Google Links Suspected Russian Actor to CANFAIL Malware Attacks
cn_title: Google 將懷疑的俄羅斯行動者與針對烏克蘭組織的 CANFAIL 惡意軟體攻擊聯繫起來
en_summary: A previously undocumented threat actor, possibly linked to Russian intelligence, was identified using CANFAIL malware against Ukrainian targets, leveraging LLMs for reconnaissance.
cn_summary: 一個先前未被記錄的威脅行為者（可能與俄羅斯情報部門有關）被發現利用 CANFAIL 惡意軟體攻擊烏克蘭目標，並利用大語言模型進行偵察。

en_title: Taiwan Hikes 2026 Growth Forecast to 7.7% on AI Demand
cn_title: AI 需求強勁，台灣上調 2026 年經濟增長預期至 7.7%
en_summary: Driven by global demand for AI infrastructure, Taiwan has significantly increased its economic outlook, capturing a massive share of the AI hardware market.
cn_summary: 在全球對 AI 基礎設施的強勁需求推動下，台灣顯著上調了經濟前景，在 AI 硬件市場中佔據了巨大份額。

en_title: Agentic AI Transforms In-Chat Payments and Banking
cn_title: 代理式 AI 轉型聊天支付與銀行服務
en_summary: Recent deployments show a surge in Agentic AI maturity, moving from chatbots to autonomous entities managing complex financial workflows like cross-border settlements.
cn_summary: 近期部署顯示代理式 AI 正在走向成熟，從聊天機器人演變為能管理跨國結算等複雜金融工作流的自主實體。

en_title: Bangladesh Nationalist Party Claims Election Victory
cn_title: 孟加拉大選：民族主義黨宣佈勝利，政治版圖將重塑
en_summary: The Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP) officially declared victory in the first general election since the 2024 uprising. This marks a potential shift in South Asian geopolitics.
cn_summary: 孟加拉國民族主義黨宣佈在 2024 年起義後的首次大選中獲勝，這標誌著南亞地緣政治可能發生重大轉變。

en_title: US Ends Temporary Protected Status for Yemen
cn_title: 美國結束對也門移民的臨時保護身份 (TPS)
en_summary: The Trump administration announced the termination of Temporary Protected Status for Yemenis in the US. DHS Secretary Kristi Noem cited the move as part of broader immigration control efforts.
cn_summary: 特朗普政府宣佈終止也門移民的臨時保護身份。國土安全部長諾姆指出，這是加強移民管控措施的一部分。

cn_title: FinovateEurope 2026：量子技術與 AI 成為焦點
en_summary: Experts highlighted how quantum-enhanced AI models are improving predictive accuracy for trading.
cn_summary: 專家指出量子增強型 AI 模型正顯著提升交易預測準確性。
